valItem.gloss: this declaration is added to the current definitions
(当該宣言は現行定義に追加される．)
this declaration and all of its children are removed from the current setup
(当該宣言と当該以下の子要素は，現行定義から外される．)
this declaration changes the declaration of the same name in the current definition
(当該宣言は，現行定義中の同名宣言を修正する．)
this declaration replaces the declaration of the same name in the current definition
(当該宣言は，現行定義中の同名宣言に置き換わる．)

remarks.p: ADD means Create me if I dont exist[Process my new children in ADD mode] Raise an error if I do exist and am identifiable REPLACE Leave me alone Process my new children in REPLACE mode Dont process my old children DELETE Don't process me or my children (any new children supplied are erroneous) CHANGE Leave me alone and process my old and new children in CHANGE mode
